english.segment1: Come close to me, too close for words. And still my beating heart. I find your thoughts without one glance. We're going all the way
english.segment2: With you I'm washed as white as the snow. And all crimson stain becomes just a shadow. You know I would be blind without you. So light up my way to find my way home. Today, today, today, we're going all the way
english.segment3: Tears sometimes fall upon my face. And join the oil of gladness. How can it be I've found this love. A love that let me fly
english.segment4: With you I'm washed as white as the snow. And all crimson stain becomes just a shadow. You know I would be blind without you. So light up my way to find my way home again. Today, today, today, we're going all the way
english.segment5: Today, today, today, we're going all the way.
